explicit.modelviews

Class DTMCAlteredDistributions

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.modelviews.ModelView
      • explicit.modelviews.DTMCView
        • explicit.modelviews.DTMCAlteredDistributions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DTMC, Model, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DTMCAlteredDistributions
extends DTMCView
    A view of a DTMC where for selected states the transitions are changed.
    The new transitions are given by a function (int state) -> Iterator, i.e., providing an iterator over the outgoing transitions. A return value of null is interpreted as "keep the original transitions".

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface explicit.DTMC
